short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to enter text & replace tabs with commas, convert text to list & values in SQL format & lines into Comma-Separated List

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed for quick text transformations, this extension allows you to streamlining data formatting and improving text consistency. Simply does the job.
